scripts.postinstall: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run build:client
scripts.check: npm run check:prettier && npm run lint && npm run typescript && npm test
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.typescript: npm run typescript:client && npm run typescript:server
scripts.clean:all: rimraf client/dist client/.parcel-cache node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules
